item.title: Handbook of Statistical Analyses Using R
item.description: 1 Chapter 1 - Introduction to R 1.1 Import the Dataset 1.1.1 .csv File 1.1.2 .xlsx File 1.1.3 .rda Files 1.2 Export the Dataset 1.3 Get the Meta-data of the Dataset 1.4 Simple Summary Statistics 1 Chapter 1 - Introduction to R 1.1 Import the Dataset 1.1.1 .csv File # Method 1: data("Forbes2000", package = "HSAUR3") # Method 2: #csvForbes2000 <- read.table("Forbes2000.csv",header = TRUE, sep = ",", row.

item.title: R Notebook
item.description: 1 R Setup 101 1.1 R Packages for Basic R Installation or Update 1.2 Read SAS sas7bdat data into R 1.2.1 Use library sas7bdat in R 1.2.2 Use library haven package in R 1.2.3 Load Data files in R Studio 2 Create a Website using RMarkdown 2.1 RMarkdown, Hugo, Netlify 2.2 Blogdown & Hugo - Fix ToC (with Rmd) 3 Write a Reproducible Paper using RMarkdown 3.
